testcase.name: Create and schedule a task
testcase.system-out: Given User navigates to the application.....................................passed When User enters the username...............................................passed And User enters the password................................................passed And Clicks on the login button..............................................passed When User navigates to the application dashboard............................passed And User clicks on add button...............................................passed And User enters the title 'Automation scheduling task'......................passed And User clicks on create task button.......................................passed And User clicks on the no schedule option...................................passed And User selects the start date '26'........................................passed And user Selects the end date '30'..........................................passed And User clicks on close button.............................................passed And User clicks on record option............................................passed And User clicks on quick records option.....................................passed And User clicks on open all task option.....................................passed Then User clicks on existing task 'Automation scheduling task'..............passed And Verify the scheduled date range is from '26' to '30'....................passed
